## MessageBoxOptions interface

showMessageBox options

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface MessageBoxOptions 
```

## Remarks

If `title` is omitted, it will be the current window's title. If `buttons` is omitted or an empty array, will result in one button labeled "OK".
